title: The Bakugou Lab
description:
by bittermoons

After Bakugou ends up returning to UA as a professor, he gets more than he expected when he meets Kouta.

Words: 4640, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of Plus Ultra Robotics

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku, Izumi Kouta, Eri (My Hero Academia), Todoroki Shouto, Uraraka Ochako, Midoriya Inko, Bakugou Mitsuki
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku, Minor or Background Relationship(s)

blog.description:
This is a prompt blog. Most of these prompts will be by me and they'll be limited to fandoms I know.

Submissions are acceptable so long as they follow the rules, if not I'll just delete them.

summary:
Fandom: Boku no Hero Academia Characters: Midoriya Hisashi Warnings: Discrimination, Bullying Prompt: 

Midoriya Hisashi's...
body:
Fandom: Boku no Hero Academia
Characters: Midoriya Hisashi
Warnings: Discrimination, Bullying

Prompt: Midoriya Hisashi’s firebreathing quirk was easy to fake. He’d started it at the age of six, after a year and a half of being called quirkless.

blog.name: springwritess
blog.title: H A F S A
blog.description:
she/her. xv. infp. fanfic writer. hufflepuff. mostly one piece. multifandom. nestea enthusiast.

I DON’T TAKE REQUESTS!!

body:
beautiful | tenya iida

anime: bnha

word count: 556

note: ew what is this it’s so bad.

tags: fluff, kisses, iida being a cutie, sleeping

***

  You were laying down on the grass as you felt the suns warm rays shine onto your skin. You sighed as you rolled onto your stomach and pulled out your phone. It’s been about an hour or so. You were waiting for your boyfriend to come and hang with you. You guys decided to meet up at the park, but unfortunately he was late. Which was odd especially for someone who’s always about being on time.

“I wonder what’s taking him so long,” you muttered to yourself, “he’s not the type to take so long with him being class president and all.”


You rolled into your stomach and rested your head on the grass. People were walking by whispering. You caught the gist of what they said. They called you weird for sitting all alone. You rolled your eyes, and then closed them. I’ll just rest my eyes. The breeze eventually stirred you to sleep.


~


Shit…


The male was racing across the straight. He weaved through crowds of people. He almost knocked an elderly man who was feeding some pigeons. The man shot him a dirty look. Iida rubbed his head sheepishly and gave a pick bow as an apology.


He continued to race off, and eventually reached the park. It was sunset. He watched with an unwavering gaze, as a fiery red orb of light slowly sank beneath the horizon. The sky was dyed first orange, then red, then dark blue. It was then painted with stars and they illuminated the sky.


He looked around, and saw a figure laying on the grass. He saw a mop of (h/c) hair. Iida raced over in a split second and saw you sleeping. He smiled and stroked your head. He chuckled softly to himself. “I can’t believe she was here the whole day,” He said.


You stirred and opened your eyes. They met another pair of familiar ones. You jumped up and felt your cheeks redden. He saw me sleeping..? Did I snore or fart..?


He moves his head closer to yours. You sir frozen. He leans in, his forehead resting on yours. “Im so sorry (y/n). You waited so long for me,” Iida said with guilt written all over his face.


“Oh it’s fine. Don’t worr-”


  He interrupted you by placing his lips on yours. The whole world fell away. It was slow and soft, comforting in ways that words can never be. His hand rested below your ear, his thumb caressing your cheek as their breaths mingled. You ran your fingers down his spine, pulling him closer until there was no space left between them and you could feel the beating of his heart against your chest.


You finally pulled away and was breathless. You smiled at him, and felt your cheeks heat up out of embarrassment. I can’t believe I did that…


“Let me take you home,” He hoists you up onto his back. You wrapped your legs around his waist. You hooked your arms around his neck. You could feel your cheeks starting to heat up. This is very embarrassing.


“Thank you (y/n). Thank you for everything. I love you so much,”

“Thank you (y/n). Thank you for everything. I love you so much,”

summary: We would steal each other's grief We were thin, but we were thick as thieves
